name: AM Data Service
tag_list: it-support, it-consulting, detroit-it-support, michigan-it-consultants, network-monitoring, managed-services
overview:
AM Data Service is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, providing IT consulting, it support and network service to businesses of all sizes in Detroit, Livonia, Troy and surrounding Michigan areas.

AM Data Service, Inc. provides several alternatives for Network Support including On-Site and Remote Support options as well as proactive managed services and network monitoring solutions.

AM Data offers preventative maintenance and comprehensive real-time monitoring of your critical network and desktop devices to enhance the stability of IT assets.

Certified Enterprise Content Management (ECM) and Document Imaging Engineers can work with you to develop ECM solutions for your business that can add efficiency and reduce overhead. AM Data offers Remote and On-Site engagements that can include Workflow Development, Workflow Programming and Scripting, Infrastructure Design and Analysis, as well as System Administration.
